name: vscode-add-signature
description: Add signature automatically to every new file created.

vscode-add-signature.enableAddSignature.description: Enable to add signature text in new creating files

vscode-add-signature.signatureText.markdownDescription:
Enter the signature text to be added at the top of each new file.

**Example**
```
* author Saquib Shaikh
* created on ${DD-MM-YYYY-hh-mm}
* github: https://github.com/saquibshaikh14
* copyright ${YEAR}
```

**Output:**
```
/**
* author Saquib Shaikh
* created on 16-03-2024-10-30
* github: https://github.com/saquibshaikh14
* copyright 2024
**/
```

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
